title: Surface Modification of Mesostructured Cellular Foam to Enhance Hydrogen Storage in binary THF/H2 Clathrate Hydrate

This study introduces solid-state tuning of a mesostructured cellular foam (MCF) to enhance hydrogen (H2) storage in clathrate hydrates Grafting of promoter-like molecules (e.g., Tetrahydrofuran), at the internal surface of...
